org.tsugi.base

Class BaseTsugi

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.tsugi.base.BaseTsugi
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Tsugi
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Tsugi_JDBC

    public abstract class BaseTsugi
extends Object
implements Tsugi
    The base implementation for the Tsugi interface This contains things like OAuth handling that will likely be common across lots of implementations independent of persistence implementation.

      Properties extractPost(Properties i)

      Get the launch information for the current session
      abstract Launch getLaunch(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest req, Properties props, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse res)
      The factory for launches - called at the beginning of each request/response cycle This is highly implementation specific and needs to be overriden by the ultimate implementation class.

      Get the launch information for the current session with only properties
